function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High percentage of homes in acute multidimensional poverty (MDP)","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 contraction and spread due to malnutrition, inadequate sanitation, and weakened immune systems","Mitigation":"Addressing malnutrition, improving access to clean water and sanitation, and providing healthcare support for vulnerable populations","Technologies":"Sanitation infrastructure, water purification systems, and healthcare services","People":"People living in homes in acute multidimensional poverty","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations, NGOs"},{"Description":"Unsafe drinking water and malnutrition","Impact":"Weakened immune systems and increased susceptibility to COVID-19","Mitigation":"Improving access to safe drinking water, addressing malnutrition, and providing healthcare support for vulnerable populations","Technologies":"Water purification systems, food security interventions, healthcare services","People":"People with unsafe drinking water and those affected by malnutrition","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations, NGOs"},{"Description":"Positive correlation between MDP and COVID-19 cases","Impact":"Higher incidence of COVID-19 cases in areas with high MDP, indicating the increased risk for vulnerable populations","Mitigation":"Implement targeted COVID-19 response measures in high MDP areas, increase access to healthcare resources, and support socio-economic development to address poverty","Technologies":"Data analysis for targeted responses, healthcare infrastructure development, and socio-economic development programs","People":"Residents of areas with high MDP and increased COVID-19 cases","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations, community development organizations"}]}
